attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We've paid the tax already ...so many times in fact...to have to pay tax on a state pension is outrageous, an insult, and seriously crippling when a person is on a small income. It is time to show real respect for the elders of our society.

www.matureandmultitalented.com is sending this epetition to  agencies and organisations working with this age group. Our mission is to make lifetimes of experience available to a world that needs it, and to see that experience being valued and properly supported and sought. So sign up here in support of making the state pension tax exempt.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make state pensions tax exempt."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
